Chapter 1136

Chapter 1136: Seduced, Passive Points +1 （2）

Translator: Nyoi-Bo Studio Editor: Nyoi-Bo Studio

Although the water ball around her protected her safety, it was also nibbling away at her life.

However, Golden Foot was too powerless to do anything about it.

“I’ll have to consume elixirs in about a moment. However, I didn’t bring much spiritual source recovery elixirs with me this time…”

“I have to find someone!”

“I have to catch another drowning person and suck them dry. Only then will I be able to hold on until the turning point.”

!!

A fiery expression appeared on Golden Foot’s face. Her eyes were filled with anxiety as she licked her red lips.

After falling into the water, her simple disguise technique had long since been shattered by the water pressure.

Golden Foot could no longer maintain her ordinary-looking female form and revealed her true form. Even her face, filled with frustration, had a soul-stirring allure.

Sinking…

The water ball was still sinking endlessly…

Soon, the powerful endurance of a higher void gave Golden Foot a turn for the better.

In the vast deep sea, another water ball appeared in her field of vision. Her blurred vision could still notice this evident change even if her spiritual senses were restricted.

“Someone’s coming!”

Golden Foot’s eyes instantly lit up.

Even though she was under the deep sea, she could already smell the person’s scent on the other side without looking through the water ball.

A man!

It was the scent of a powerful man!

“Hehehe…”

Golden Foot’s lips curled into a smile, and her delicate body began to tremble simultaneously.

She lowered her head and quickly moved her hands. Soon, the simple and unadorned clothes on her body were torn to shreds and could barely cover her body.

Then, she faced the other side through the water ball and waved her hands vigorously.

“Save me!”

“Young sir, save me!”

…

“Called, Passive Points, +1.”

The information bar jumped, and Xu Xiaoshou was slightly startled.

This was the first time he had met a contestant who had taken the initiative to call out to him.

After parting with Night Guardian, he continued to sink into the deep sea and encountered other people.

However, these people were either already dead or afraid of being taken advantage of. They hurriedly manipulated the water ball and left, cutting off all communication.

In line with the principle that it was better to avoid trouble, Xu Xiaoshou did not interact with other people.

The reason was that he was also afraid of being taken advantage of.

After all, anyone who fell into the sea had a higher cultivation level than him. Who knew what trump card they had?

Besides…

After learning from Water Ghost that he was a wanted criminal, Xu Xiaoshou didn’t dare to do anything else.

However, he really didn’t expect that there would be someone calling for his help at this moment.

Judging from the voice, the person was a woman?

“Go over?”

Xu Xiaoshou was a little hesitant.

He had long noticed that there was a water ball nearby. He wanted to avoid it, but the voice on the other side was pleasant to hear. It was too inviting, and he was stuck in a dilemma.

“Save me!”

The pitiful and helpless voice sounded again.

Xu Xiaoshou’s heart trembled, and he shivered. He immediately decided to meet her!

He felt that he was a righteous person. Under the circumstances where he could only do what he could, saving a helpless woman was very gentlemanly.

He stomped his foot.

With the help of the recoil, Xu Xiaoshou quickly approached the water ball.

However, soon, his movements were completely frozen.

“This?”

When his vision was no longer blurry, “Perception” finally showed the scene in the water ball. Xu Xiaoshou’s eyes were wide open as if he had seen something unbelievable.

In the water ball opposite him, there was a woman who was so poor that she could not afford clothes and could only wrap a few simple strips of cloth around her body. She was crying for help.

Each of her actions covered the key points on her body perfectly. However, she also displayed her perfect figure, showing off her beauty.

“Gulp.”

Xu Xiaoshou’s adam apple bobbed. Suddenly, he felt that the Spell Forbidden Barrier had lost its effect.

This was because his body was starting to heat up. The Infernal White Flame’s mischievous act was definitely to blame.

“You…”

When he got closer, Xu Xiaoshou asked with difficulty, “What do you need help with?”

“I’m poisoned.” The woman in the water ball held her chest with a helpless and pitiful look. It could easily trigger people’s desire to protect her.

“Seduced, Passive Points + 1.”

“Seduced, Passive Points + 1.”

The information bar popped up as if it was reminding Xu Xiaoshou of the unusual situation.

At this moment, Xu Xiaoshou hated that this annoying information bar didn’t have a mute button. He asked calmly, “Poisoned? How can you be poisoned under the deep sea?”

After all, with the information bar’s reminder, he calmed down before his lust got to his head. At the same time, he thought of many things.

“I’ve never seen this person before. There shouldn’t be such a person at the bottom of the Lone Cliff, right?

“But no matter what, those who can fall into the water are all big shots. They’re definitely either at the early stage of Sovereign, a higher void, or even higher than a higher void. There’s no way to determine if a person was trapped at the bottom of the Lone Cliff.

“She is so beautiful…”

“Bah! What am I thinking?”

“Is this a disguise? I have never seen such a beautiful girl on the Lone Cliff! Is this her real appearance, or is it her disguised appearance?”

“I hope this is real…”

“What a big water ball…”

While Xu Xiaoshou’s thoughts were a mess.

The woman, who was so poor that she could not afford any clothes, bit her lower lip and said pitifully, “This water ball is draining my spiritual source. I could not withstand it and took elixirs, but…but…”

“But what?” Xu Xiaoshou couldn’t help but ask.

The woman in shabby clothes suddenly blushed and buried her face in her chest with embarrassment. “I originally wanted to eat elixirs to restore my spiritual source, but in a moment of panic, I took the wrong elixirs. I took another kind of elixirs…”

“Another kind?” Xu Xiaoshou’s adam apple rolled again as he repeated, “What elixirs?”

“Spring Heart Elixir!”

“Seduced, Passive Points, + 1.”

“Seduced, Passive Points + 1.”

As soon as she finished speaking, the information bar instantly popped up.

Xu Xiaoshou exhaled. He felt that the heat emitted from his body was about to evaporate the water ball.

He was almost destroyed by the three words “Spring Heart Elixir”.

These elixirs were aphrodisiac elixirs. The applicable scenarios were indescribable. They were suitable for both men and women.

As an elixir master at the sovereign stage, how could Xu Xiaoshou not understand what the other party meant?

The other party needed someone to help her dispel the ‘poison’ of the Spring Heart Elixir!

Xu Xiaoshou panted heavily. If the information bar hadn’t reminded him, Xu Xiaoshou felt he would have fallen into the trap.

However, the other party’s obvious temptation and seduction could still make him fall into the trap. Xu Xiaoshou could not help but start to think,

“This witch’s technique is not simple!

“Perhaps, the thing she cultivates is compatible with the ‘Guidance’ power. If I go over, wouldn’t I be eaten clean?”

“What a white water ball…”

“Spit!”

Xu Xiaoshou shook his head to get rid of his jumbled thoughts. He said with a slightly steady voice, “Miss, I’m afraid that there is only one way to cure the poison of the Spring Heart Elixir in the entire world!”

When the woman heard this across the water ball, she immediately buried her head lower. Her voice was like a mosquito as she replied, “Yes, so, can you…can you help me?”

“Bewitched. Passive Points +1.”

Xu Xiaoshou almost lost his mind once again.

Fortunately, every time this kind of situation happened, the ‘Spirit Awakening’ that came with the ‘Disillusionment Finger’ would come out and disrupt the case.

He took a deep breath and said, “Fortunately, you met me. With my expertise, I can just help you.”

“Then, can you come over?” The woman raised her head. Her eyes were full of emotion, and her cheeks were as red as blood.

Xu Xiaoshou was stunned by this incredibly charming face, but he quickly woke up and knew that the other party’s technique caused this. He immediately shook his head and said,

“I can help you even without going over.”

“The Spring Heart Elixir is a grade eight elixir. Its aphrodisiac medicinal efficacy is strong, but its grade is too low.”

“I don’t have the detoxification pill on me for the time being. However, using ‘Flower and Grass’ as the main ingredient, supplemented with the ‘Heart-Clearing Fruit’, ‘Cooling Stamen’, and ‘Yangzhi Wood’, with the ratio of 7:1:1:1, I should be able to achieve the effect of alleviating the aphrodisiac medicinal efficacy.”

Xu Xiaoshou spoke with assurance.

After saying that, he took out the corresponding spiritual herbs from his ring and said, “I’m sorry, there’s still a Spell Forbidden Barrier under the deep sea. I cannot help you by conducting alchemy, so I can only let you eat raw spiritual medicine.”

Golden Foot was confused.

She was stunned for a moment, “What did you say?”

A smile appeared on Xu Xiaoshou’s face, and he said, “You are very lucky to be able to meet me while you were poisoned. Fortunately, I’m very familiar with medicinal principles!”

After pausing for a moment, Xu Xiaoshou puffed out his chest and said confidently, “I am an Elixir Master at the sovereign stage. I can cure your poison!”
